mapper.update: update logistics_car set routeID = #{routeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carType = #{cartype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carOrign = #{carorign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carProDate = #{carprodate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, carBuyDate = #{carbuydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, carCapacity = #{carcapacity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, carState = #{carstate,jdbcType=BIT}, COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where carID = #{carid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select carID, routeID, carType, carOrign, carProDate, carBuyDate, carCapacity, carState, COMMENT from logistics_car where carID = #{carid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select carID, routeID, carType, carOrign, carProDate, carBuyDate, carCapacity, carState, COMMENT from logistics_car
